definitions.definition: a large animal kept on farms to produce milk or beef

examples.text: a herd of **dairy cows** *(= cows kept for their milk)*

definitions.definition: the female of the elephant, whale and some other large animals
an offensive word for a woman who you do not like
an unpleasant person, thing or situation
to become very angry or anxious about something

examples.text: Don't have a cow—it's no big deal.

definitions.definition: for a very long time; forever

examples.text: You can talk till the cows come home—you’ll never make me change my mind.

wordOrigin: noun Old English cū, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch koe and German Kuh, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin bos and Greek bous.
